title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 14a - Enlargement of conditions of probation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 14a - Enlargement of conditions of probation

State Regulations

Sec. 410.20, 410.40 C.P.L. FORM 14a
(Enlargement of

Conditions of Probation)
1/87
ENLARGEMENT OF CONDITIONS OF PROBATION
APPLICATION
STATE OF NEW YORK)
) ss.: COUNTY OF ________)
________, being duly sworn, deposes and
says: I am a probation officer with the ____________
Department of Probation. I am responsible for
[County]
supervising the probation of
____________
[Name of Probationer]
who was convicted of (adjudicated a youthful
offender for the act of)
[Date of conviction], on
______
[Name of Court] by the ________, and was
sentenced by
[Name of Judge/Justice]
to ________. Based upon the following () new information ()
change in circumstances ________________________
____________, pursuant to C.P.L. §§410.20 and
410.40, the
[County] Department of

Probation requests the Court to order
probationer personally to appear before the Court at the time and place set
forth below, so that the Court may entertain the Department's request that
probationer's conditions of probation be enlarged as follows
____________
____________
____________
____________
______________
(Signature)

Sworn to before me this
________ day of ________, 19________. ______________
Notary Public
COURT ORDER
The above application by the ____________
Department of
[County]
Probation is granted. The probationer is
directed to appear before the Court on ________ at ________ (a.m.)(p.m.) in

Part ________ at ________. This order shall be (mailed to) (served personally
upon) the probationer. ______________
Judge (Justice)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
NOTICE TO PROBATIONER
YOU HAVE BEEN ORDERED TO APPEAR BEFORE THE
COURT AT THE ABOVE TIME AND PLACE. FAILURE TO APPEAR AS ORDERED WITHOUT
REASONABLE CAUSE THEREFOR CONSTITUTES A VIOLATION OF THE CONDITIONS OF YOUR
SENTENCE OF PROBATION, AND MAY RESULT IN REVOCATION OF YOUR PROBATION AND
ISSUANCE OF A WARRANT DIRECTING THAT YOU BE TAKEN INTO CUSTODY AND BROUGHT
BEFORE THE COURT. Date mailed () served upon () probationer: ________, 19________
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form
14a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
